name: Tanks: No Button Left Unpressed
description:
Soft-bullet-hell action...
  • You have to dodge bullets, but you have time to analyze each room before going into the enemy's fire.
...with a side of puzzler.
  • We've got buttons and crates. Does that count as puzzle?
  • We've also got mirrors, dark areas, lamps, and landmines that aren't buried in the ground for some reason. Careful out there.
Slow-motion.
  • Take time to breathe. You're in the middle of a battlefield. Bullets are flying towards you. Your crew can slow time down and allow you to pilot the tank out of danger or return fire. Be careful though, this ability won't last forever.
Boss-fights.
  • 4 unique bosses. Defeat them all.
  • Destroy the laser superweapon that was developed by the criminal superpower Unreal. Save the world.
EFGame's Fastest Times:
  • Level 1: 75.00 s
  • Level 2: 76.09 s
  • Level 3: 94.53 s
  • Level 4: 54.50 s
  • Think you can beat us? Post a screenshot of your fastest times!
  • We're a group of rookie undergrad students, who mocked this up for a game design class.
  • The Team:
    • Charlie: Team lead, Programmer
    • Dang-Khoa: Programmer, Artist, Sounds
    • Nicholas: Programmer, Level Designer
    • Jonathan: UI & Menus
    • Vincent: Programmer, Artist
  • Be honest about any of your comments. We appreciate any and all constructive feedback.
  • There are bugs in the game. We're sorry if they ruin your world record run.
  • Lastly, we hope you find enjoyment in our game! Thanks for playing!

Other Credits:

Music: WolframTones

Parts of our logo: Genshin Impact

(We do not own any assets from those sources above.)
